scripts.dist: rm -rf ./dist && cp -r ./src dist && cp package-prod.json dist/package.json
scripts.npm-build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp package-prod.json dist/package.json && cp README.MD dist && tsc --outDir dist --declarationDir dist
scripts.tsc:watch: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir dist && cp package.json dist && tsc --watch --outDir dist --declarationDir dist --sourceMap true
scripts.build:ts:watch: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir dist && cp package-prod.json dist/package.json && tsc --watch --outDir dist --declarationDir dist --sourceMap true
